Articles.Content: Hi all, the name's Maximus, CarlosMaximus, licence to crash (a LOT). Been playing since Xmas Day, saw a friend's pics on FB, got the demo, immediately changed my mind about what to get myself for Xmas! Been dipping in and out of the forums, looking for hints, tips and designs to stea... "be inspired by":wink:, but never posted, so just thought I'd say Hi! Also, quick question, seen a few posts/comments about resource mods, already got Kethane, are there more?
hey there Carlos I too have been dipping in and out and having fun in here. You'll like these folks. It's a pretty cool crowd of nerds feel welcomed brother
Hello CarlosMaximus. There's a sort of shopping center for mods here. Incidentally, your Christmas Day sounds better than mine, as I spent it barfing with the flu.
Thanks for the heads-up Vanamonde, a really interesting site! Hope you recovered quickly.
Welcome! If you have trouble installing any of them, they might be out of date.
